title: Demo of HDBSCAN Clustering Algorithm
description: In this lab, we will learn about the HDBSCAN clustering algorithm, which is an improvement over the DBSCAN algorithm. We will compare both algorithms on specific datasets and evaluate HDBSCAN's sensitivity to certain hyperparameters.

meta.title: Exploring HDBSCAN Clustering Algorithm
meta.description: Learn about the HDBSCAN clustering algorithm, its advantages over DBSCAN, and how to apply it to sample datasets.
meta.keywords: machine learning, hdbscan, dbscan, scikit-learn, data analysis, scikit-learn playground, clustering algorithm

i18n.title: HDBSCAN聚类算法演示
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将了解HDBSCAN聚类算法，它是对DBSCAN算法的改进。我们将在特定数据集上比较这两种算法，并评估HDBSCAN对某些超参数的敏感性。

meta.title: 探索HDBSCAN聚类算法
meta.description: 了解HDBSCAN聚类算法、它相对于DBSCAN的优势以及如何将其应用于样本数据集。
meta.keywords: 机器学习, HDBSCAN, DBSCAN,  scikit-learn, 数据分析, scikit-learn游乐场, 聚类算法
